title: Epitaph for Kassia Benousta
support: Marble plaque set in plaster in modern times.

handNote.lettering: Regular letters: rhomboid Θ, Ο, Ω (open); Α with accentuated upper serif, Μ with slanting full-length bars (but irregular), Υ with an extended right arm (line 6), ΗΝΕ at l. 4 and ΤΗ at l. 5 (x2) in ligature. In the last line, some letters are smaller than others for lack of space.

provenanceFound._: Original discovery not recorded, probably from Catania..

provenanceObserved._: Observed by Kaibel in Museo dei Benedettini, later by Korhonen in magazzino del cortile, Collezione dei Benedettini (formerly sala VI.50)

facsimile.desc: I.Sicily with the permission of the Assessorato Regionale dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana - Dipartimento dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana

location.address: Castello Ursino, Piazza Federico II di Svevia, 95121 Catania (CT)
